title: BRIEF-Oclaro - Upon Deal Termination Under Certain Circumstances, Co May Be Required To Pay Lumentum Fee Of $63 Mln/Lumentum To Pay Co Fee Of $80 Mln
text: Market News  29 AM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Oclaro - Upon Deal Termination Under Certain Circumstances, Co May Be Required To Pay Lumentum Fee Of $63 Mln/Lumentum To Pay Co Fee Of $80 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 12 (Reuters) - Lumentum Holdings Inc: * OCLARO - UPON DEAL TERMINATION UNDER CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES, CO MAY BE REQUIRED TO PAY LUMENTUM FEE OF $63 MILLION/LUMENTUM TO PAY CO FEE OF $80 MILLION Source text: ( bit.ly/2Gg3toN ) Further company coverage:
